title: Baby Carrier
description: 5\" waist band and ties in one piece (PR is cut off);  band has orange, yellow and black appliqued strips bordering horizontal black and tan embroidered \"train-like\" design; design is repeated in three flaps hanging loose form waist band with strings and 6 coins; main body has decanter shape applique and embroiderd section in green, yellow. purple and red on red field with yellow border; unlined; extra 3 1/2\" flap under bottom edge.
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
